name: In Liminal (Demo)
description:
I do not intend to finish this game, and I thought I might as well send out the mostly finished demo.

In Liminal is surreal exploration game, based on games like: 21 The World, and LSD Dream Simulator. 

Note: There are no save point so if you get stuck that's basically game over and you can restart from the menu. 

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Movement

Q W: Strafe Left & Right

Z: Interact

X: Menu
